- Perfect for casual wear and outdoor activities.
- Practical design with outer chest and waist pockets, hand warmers, plus inner chest and waist pockets for plenty of storage capacity.
- High-performance outdoor wear, designed for everyday styling.
- Improved hood and collar shape.
- Next-generation outerwear that combines down and functional padding.
- A sleek design without compromising on warmth.
- Ideal for outdoor activities or casual wear.
